body.name: Elite Platinum EAF5317D Digital 5.3Qt Hot Air Fryer 7 Menu Functions 1350W Oil-Less Healthy Cooker, Timer & Temperature Controls, PFOA/PTFE Free, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins
features: EXTRA LARGE CAPACITY: The non-stick basket holds 5.3 quarts or up to 3.75lb of food, perfect for family-sized meals. Cook healthier, faster and more safely than deep frying in oil, eliminating splatter, fatty oils and reducing electricity use

HEALTHY EATING by cooking with 85% less oil for fat-free delicious meals. Same delicious flavor and crispy outer layer without the added calories! Simply add food to the basket (add a tbsp of oil prior to adding to fry basket if desired), set temp/time, and start cooking!

PRESET FUNCTIONS AND PROGRAMMABLE TIMER AND TEMPERATURE settings give you the ultimate in cooking control and versatility allowing you to bake pizza, air fry french fries, bake shrimp, fish & chicken, grill meats and steam vegetables with the touch of a button! A high-power convection fan envelops food in temperatures from 180 to 400F degrees and a 60-minute timer automatically shuts off the Elite Gourmet Air Fryer at the end of the cooking cycle
GUILT-FREE FRYING lets you enjoy crispy veggie chips, fish fillets, chicken tenders and more without fatty oils. Includes a cooking guide and delicious and healthy recipes to get you started
COOL-TOUCH HANDLE lets you safely remove and serve air fried foods. The exterior of the Elite Gourmet air fryer is easy to clean and retains its pristine condition using just a damp.
ETL APPROVED 1350-watt/120V Air fryer ideal for home kitchen use. Dishwasher safe removable non-stick coated air fryer pan and rack for fast, easy clean-up

TRUSTED BRAND - As a trusted brand for 40 years, Elite Gourmet has delivered high quality and stylish kitchen products that are affordable & user friendly. Call, email, or live chat with us, our US-based support team responds quickly to all inquiries.
body.description: The Elite Gourmet Oil-Free 5.3 quart Digital Air Fryer can handle a wide array of cooking tasks. With its easy to use 7 function preset menu and adjustable temperature & timer, you can fry, cook, or even bake your favorite family meals and snacks with ease! Not only can you cook foods without the mess of oil, you can cook faster than traditional cooking methods which saves you time and energy. Unlike most conventional deep fryers, the Elite Gourmet Oil-Free Air Fryer's unique vapor system combined with circulating hot air will automatically make foods crispier and of course healthier without oil. Includes a cooking guide and delicious recipes to get you started.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute air fryer
reviews.reviewText: The air fryer has a sleek design and user-friendly control panel. It's easy to navigate and offers a wide range of cooking options. It’s size is perfect for a single person, that’s a highlight to me. The removable, non-stick basket and easy cleanup are a huge plus as well. It’s so small that fits in any space and it really works well and makes you save time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little appliance
reviews.reviewText: Bought this small air fryer for our RV. It is the perfect size for it. Stores easily when not in use. Easily cleaned when using those air fryer liners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and does the job
reviews.reviewText: I bought a used (like new) product. The tray fits slightly wonkily but it’s usable. Love the color!It’s perfect for a tiny kitchen and for someone living on their own. Not great for heavy duty cooking, but I’ve made chicken and reheated bakery goods in this and it worked perfectly.The intervals on the time and temp dials are a little unusual but you get used to it.Pretty easy to clean: the rack inside can be removed for cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elite Gourmet 2.1 qt air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air fryer because it's "programmable" and goes by minutes instead of 5 minute timer. I love how easy it is to clean. It's a perfect size for me since I live alone. I didn't like turning on my oven to cook 2 little hash browns. The basket holds 2 hash browns side by side just perfectly. It takes 3 minutes to preheat instead of 10 minutes on my oven. I cook the hash browns for 13 minutes and they come out crispy and perfect. I cooked the hash browns for 18 minutes in my oven. So basically half the time to cook the hash browns instead of 30 minutes using my oven. So what it does is you plug it in. It does it's little swirly thing and then 400 degrees pops up. You turn the dial to the temp you need. You then click the temp/time button to get it to the minutes. You turn the dial to how many minutes you want it to cook for. I put 7 minutes and than just let it sit. It turns itself on after a few seconds of not turning the dial. After it beeps I flip the hash browns and start the process over but only put in 6 minutes on the 2nd side. It's fast and cooks in lower temps than your oven because the fan is blowing the hot air over and around your food. I unplug the fryer and let it sit while I eat my food. I than take out the basket and dump some dawn dish soap with hot water in the basket and let it soak to let the temp of the water cool a bit. I scrub it clean, rinse and let it drip dry on a rack in my sink. Easy peasy lemon squeezy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: im a chinese, its really help me to cook foods. more ez than use pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these for myself last year and love it. I live alone and it is the perfect size for one person. I liked it so much that I gave two of them for gifts this Christmas to people who don't like figuring out complicated things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Either it’s just cheap quality or I just got a dud.
reviews.reviewText: I followed all instructions and used this air fryer for the first time this evening. I cooked a salmon filet for 15 minutes at 390. My food was burned and the fryer got so hot it began to melt the the plastic facing on the fryer itself as well as the adhesives holding things together! Went to pull the cooking basket out, the handle came off and you could see the seal around the rim of the basket was melting and warped. I will be returning and putting my money towards a better quality brand and product.

reviews.reviewerName: PeterAnthony ~ London Lush HairDesign MAKEOVERPeterAnthony ~ London Lush HairDesign MAKEOVER
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW .. LOVE THIS LITTLE GIZMO
reviews.reviewText: I've used this little gem 3 times now (I recieved it yesterday afternoon).This IS a game-changer.It operates at a very high heat and I'm just amazed at how well it cook's and heats.Rated, 700 watts maxIt never got over 625 watts with the three 20min runs.❌️ THIS IS PERFECT FOR VAN-LIFEThe silicone dish insert, I used at first, got EXTREEMELY hot, so gloves and silicone tipped tongs highly recommended.I used without the silicone dish and the A.F. worked brilliantly.👌 Can't wait to bake some quality bread rolls and other things I've not had in a LONG time..!..and to realize this very handy gizmo cost LESS THAN 40 US$ delivered to Hawai'i . . . .🤩

I just received this yesterday but am impressed so far. I air fried some carrot strips and potato wedges and was very pleased with the results, so much easier and better than oven roasting. It’s a perfect size for one or two people and is super easy to clean. I just tossed the veggies with a tiny bit of oil and seasoning and they turned out perfectly. It has a cute design and is small enough to store easily. Based on my experience so far, I would definitely recommend.
Love the color and how easy it is to clean perfect for a single person
